statements: SELECT influencer_name, revenue FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE cost > 500
SELECT * FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE revenue >= 1000 ORDER BY influencer_name DESC
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, cost, revenue FROM influencer_marketing_roi LIMIT 3
SELECT influencer_name, cost FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE revenue BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM influencer_marketing_roi ORDER BY cost ASC, revenue DESC
SELECT influencer_name, revenue FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, cost, revenue FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY influencer_name;
SELECT influencer_name, revenue FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE revenue < cost * 2 ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, cost, revenue FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE cost < 200 AND revenue > 500 ORDER BY cost ASC, revenue DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_name FROM influencer_marketing_roi WHERE cost = revenue ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, follower_count FROM influencers WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, cost, revenue FROM campaigns WHERE revenue > cost;
SELECT id, name, follower_count FROM influencers;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, cost, revenue FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT influencers.name, campaigns.campaign_name, orders.total_amount FROM influencers JOIN campaigns ON influencers.id = campaigns.influencer_id JOIN orders ON campaigns.id = orders.campaign_id;
SELECT MAX(follower_count) AS max_followers, MIN(cost) AS min_cost FROM influencers;
SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT campaign_name, total_cost, revenue_generated FROM Campaigns WHERE total_cost > revenue_generated
SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000
SELECT campaign_name, total_cost, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 3.5
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 5000 AND engagement_rate > 5
SELECT * FROM influencer
SELECT name, followers FROM influencer WHERE followers > 10000
SELECT * FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT id, likes, comments FROM post WHERE likes > 500 ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM influencer ORDER BY followers DESC, engagement_rate ASC
SELECT name, followers, engagement_rate FROM influencer WHERE followers > 10000 AND engagement_rate > 5.0
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT influencer.name, campaign.start_date, post.likes FROM influencer INNER JOIN campaign ON influencer.id = campaign.influencer_id INNER JOIN post ON influencer.id = post.influencer_id WHERE post.likes > 1000 ORDER BY post.post_date ASC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget < 5000;
SELECT post_id, post_date, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT cost_type, cost_amount FROM costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000 ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date='2022-01-01' AND end_date<'2022-12-31';
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE influencer_id=1 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM costs WHERE campaign_id=3;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, campaigns.campaign_name, revenues.revenue_amount FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id JOIN campaigns ON posts.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id JOIN revenues ON campaigns.campaign_id = revenues.campaign_id WHERE revenues.revenue_source='Ads';
